about_the_game:
Expand your adventure in Paw & Hop Jigsaw Quest with 16 all-new puzzles! Dive deeper into the enchanting world of curious kittens and playful bunnies as you piece together scenes bursting with charm and whimsy.

Each new puzzle is a unique work of art, showcasing heartwarming moments of fluffy fun, from bunnies frolicking in fields of wildflowers to kittens discovering hidden treasures in sun-dappled corners. Whether you're a casual puzzler or a seasoned pro, there's a perfect challenge waiting for you!

DLC Highlights:

  • 16 Exclusive Puzzles: Brand-new illustrations that bring even more delightful animal antics to life.

  • Varied Difficulty: Tackle puzzles ranging from 30 to 285 pieces, customized to your skill and pace.

  • New Locations: Unlock vibrant settings filled with cozy details and interactive surprises.

Embark on this irresistible journey of fluff and fun. Add the DLC to your library today and keep the magic of Paw & Hop Jigsaw Quest alive, one piece at a time!
